titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for the vessel PANDACEA.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1888)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 103-74.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 115.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
